relations.head: Rapamycin
relations.label: inhibit
relations.text: Pretreatment of PC-3 cells with the mTOR inhibitor, rapamycin, inhibited both the accumulation of HIF-1alpha and HIF-1-dependent transcription induced by hypoxia or CoCl(2).

relations.head: mTOR
relations.label: upregulate
relations.text: Transfection of these cells with wild-type mTOR enhanced HIF-1 activation by hypoxia or CoCl(2).

relations.head: Hypoxia
relations.label: upregulate
relations.text: Under hypoxic conditions, the HIF-1alpha subunit accumulates due to a decrease in the rate of proteolytic degradation.

relations.head: Cobalt chloride
relations.label: upregulate
relations.text: In the present study, we have explored further the linkage between mTOR and HIF-1 in PC-3 prostate cancer cells treated with hypoxia or the hypoxia mimetic agent, CoCl(2).

relations.head: mTOR
relations.label: upregulate
relations.text: Pretreatment of PC-3 cells with the mTOR inhibitor, rapamycin, inhibited both the accumulation of HIF-1alpha and HIF-1-dependent transcription induced by hypoxia or CoCl(2).
